Trade/Device Name(s): Veri-Q self-testing MGD-2001 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Veri-Q plus MGD-2001 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Veri-Q self-testing and Veri-Q plus MGD-2001 Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative measurement of blood glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, palm, or forearm; the self-testing system for single patient home use and the plus system for multi-patient use in healthcare settings, as aids to monitor diabetes control (not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use).
